name: Jackstone Yacht Club
description:
This game is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

This game is a combination of the Jackstone game and the Yacht dice game. Throw the ball and collect as much dice as you can. Your score depends on the dice you collected. Try and get the highest score you can!

Credits for the assets used is in the included CREDITS file.

Changelogs

  • version 1.1
    • Added BGM and SFX.
    • Added CHANGELOG.
    • Added CREDITS.
    • Fixed bug where score is not saved when player misses their last chance.
  • version 1.0
    • Initial release.
